an5.172:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato upasako avisarado agaram ajjhavasati.
an5.172:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato upasako avisarado agaram ajjhavasati.
an5.172:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato upasako visarado agaram ajjhavasati.
an5.172:2.3: Panatipata pativirato hoti …pe… suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti.
an5.172:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato upasako visarado agaram ajjhavasati”ti.
